author: Special Correspondent
text:
The water level in the Mettur Dam stood at 63.24 feet on Wednesday against its full level of 120 feet.

The storage level stood at 27.160 tmc.

Inflow

The inflow into the dam was 93 cusecs and the discharge into River Cauvery was 5,000 cusecs, PWD sources said.
title: Water level in Mettur Dam
